input_text:
Job Title: Commercial Lines Account Executive

Location: Hyannis, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Overview

 Grow With Us!  At Hilb Group, we recognize that our associates are our greatest asset. We promote a service-driven culture of high performance that encourages career and professional development. The Hilb Group is currently seeking a motivated and ambitious Commercial Lines Account Executive to join our team. This position will report to our agency located in Hyannis, MA. The ideal candidate will be motivated to succeed, is well organized, able to prioritize, and able to work well with a team. This is a hybrid position.

Responsibilities

 Manage all aspects of client’s commercial insurance needs, from information gathering, preparing applications and renewal marketing to policy administration.  Explain coverages and types of policies, suggest specific coverage enhancements, and resolve general customer inquiries.  Develop and maintain strong professional relationships with clients, their representatives and insurance company personnel.  Accurately and efficiently maintain electronic client account records and electronic file documentation in the course of processing rewrites, endorsements, cancellations and renewals.  Participate as a Team member in a fast-paced, growing sales environment open to continuous improvement. 

Qualifications

 Bachelor’s degree  2+ years industry experience in account manager role or higher.  Ability to work independently, as well as be a team player demonstrating collaboration.  Tech-savvy with excellent command of all Microsoft programs (Office, Word, and Excel)  Must be able multi-task while maintaining accuracy.  Must be detailed oriented. Accuracy in this position is critical. 

Benefits

 Company Paid Life Insurance, Long-Term and Short-Term Disability.  Medical, Dental, Vision and FSA/HSA plans.  401(k) with company match.  Additional voluntary benefits including Critical Illness, Accident Insurance, Hospital Indemnity and Supplemental Life Insurance, Legal and Identity Protection, and Pet benefits.  Generous PTO.  An awesome team of professionals! 

The Hilb Group is an equal opportunity employer, and we actively support and comply with all applicable federal, state, and local laws prohibiting all forms of discrimination in employment. Additionally, we have a zero-tolerance policy for all forms of harassment in violation of federal, state, and local laws.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Commercial Lines Account Executive
output_json.summary: Join Hilb Group as a motivated and ambitious Commercial Lines Account Executive in Hyannis, MA.
job_responsibilities: Manage all aspects of client’s commercial insurance needs
Explain coverages and types of policies
Develop and maintain strong professional relationships
Accurately and efficiently maintain electronic records
Participate in a fast-paced, growing sales environment
benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision and FSA/HSA plans
Voluntary benefits including Critical Illness, Accident Insurance, Hospital Indemnity and Supplemental Life Insurance, Legal and Identity Protection, and Pet benefits
